Name: LU 302 - Planning, 1 Clinton Street, Brooklyn (C 150400 PQK)
Title: Resolution approving with modification the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 150400 PQK (L.U. No. 302), for the acquisition of property located at One Clinton Street, aka 280 Cadman Plaza West (Block 239, Lot 16 in part), in Community District 2, Borough of Brooklyn.

History.Action: Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by Roll Call.

\v0\par
\pard\ltrpar\keepn\nowidctlpar\s1\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928 By Council Members Greenfield and Dickens \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tab WHEREAS, the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on November 6, 2015 its decision dated November 2, 2015 (the "Decision") on the application submitted pursuant to Section 197-c of the New York City Charter by the Brooklyn Public Library and the New York City Department of Citywide Administrative Services, for the acquisition of property located at One Clinton Street, aka 280 Cadman Plaza West (Block 239, Lot 16 in part) in Community District 2  (the "Site"), (ULURP No. C 150400 PQK), Borough\expndtw-5  of Brooklyn\expndtw0  (the "Application");\par
\par
\tab WHEREAS, the Application is related to application C 150399 PPK (L.U. No. 301), disposition of one city-owned property located at One Clinton Street, aka 280 Cadman Plaza West (Block 239, Lot 16);\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\tab WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d(b)(3) of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj       \tab WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on November 18, 2015;\par
\par
\tab WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use implications and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; \par
\par
\tab WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues as described by the Environmental Assessment Statement issued on June 11, 2015, the Revised Environmental Assessment Statement and Negative Declaration issued on July 16, 2015, and the CEQR Technical Memorandum issued October 29, 2015 (CEQR No. 15DME005K) (the Environmental Assessment Statement, Revised Environmental Assessment Statement, Negative Declaration and Technical Memorandum collectively the \ldblquote CEQR Analysis and Determination\rdblquote );\par
\par
RESOLVED:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\cf1\expndtw-5 The Council finds that the action described and as modified herein will have \expndtw-4 no significant impact on the environment as set forth in the CEQR Analysis and Determination.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\cf0\expndtw0\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tab Pursuant to Section 197-d of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in this report, C 150400 PQK, incorporated by reference herein, the Council approves the acquisition of property located at One Clinton Street, aka 280 Cadman Plaza West (Block 239, Lot 16), Borough of Brooklyn, with the following modification and condition:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-360\li720\qj\tx720 1.\tab The acquisition shall be for a library with at least 26,620 square feet of floor space. \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\par
Adopted.\par
\par
      \tab Office of the City Clerk, \}\par
      \tab The City of New York,   \} ss.:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx864\tx1800\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928     \tab      \tab  I hereby certify that the foregoing is a true copy of a Resolution passed by The Council of The City of New York on December 16, 2015, on file in this office.\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qr\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\par
